title: Shiryou no Hanayome
sinopse:
1. Shiryou no Hanayome
   For years he has been searching for his missing bride, and finally he finds her - a beautiful bride in a red kimono.
2. Ma o Yobu Ie
   A house that always bring misfortune. [The same house from the 2nd story in Yuganda Kishi]
3. Yuuyake no Requiem
   It's beautiful... a red sunset, big and round... a miserable sunset...
